products.name: Galaxy S10
products.description: The next generation Samsung Galaxy S10 is as powerful, intelligent and intuitive as you are, providing endless possibilities and next- level power in performance, productivity, creation and design. The S10 features pro lenses to capture stunning photos, a powerful processor, and a long-lasting battery to optimize power and performance.
specs: 6.1" Infinity Display, Quad HD+ Dynamic AMOLED
12MP Super Speed Dual Pixel ; 16MP Ultra Wide ; 12MP 2x Zoom
